articles.author: Nathan Ridley
articles.title: Man Utd news: Full takeover likely as Erik ten Hag's Jude Bellingham claim emerges - The Mirror
articles.description: Manchester United are in the midst of their ongoing takeover saga, but fans will be pleased to learn the latest development which could finally see the Glazers walk away from Old Trafford
articles.content:
Manchester United may be winning on the pitch but off it, fans aren't so convinced that all is going to plan.
The club remain for sale, as they have done since November, with the likes of Sir Jim Ra… [+2694 chars]

articles.title: Michael Jordan's sport shoes sell for record $2.2m - BBC News - BBC News
articles.description: A pair of trainers once worn by basketball legend Michael Jordan has sold for $2.2m (£1.7m) at auction, becoming the priciest shoes ever sold.The signed snea...
